channel.title: CVE Feed for Cisco -- Cisco Video Surveillance Media Server Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cisco -- Cisco Video Surveillance Media Server Software

item.title: CVE-2018-15449|2024-08-05T09:54:03.761Z -- cisco -- cisco%20video%20surveillance%20media%20server%20software
item.description: A vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Cisco Video Surveillance Media Server could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) of the web-based management interface of an affected system. The vulnerability is due to insufficient validation of user-supplied input by the web-based management interface of the affected service. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by persuading a user of the interface to click a malicious link. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to cause the web-based management interface to become unreachable, resulting in a DoS condition.
